survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Subscription-Based Meal Kit Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate customer satisfaction levels and preferences regarding subscription-based meal kit delivery services to help improve service quality and offerings.

questions.question_text: How long have you been using a subscription-based meal kit service?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for ease of response. Ensure the options cover a broad range to capture all potential users.

script.question_text: How long have you been using a subscription-based meal kit service?

questions.question_text: Which of the following meal kit services have you used? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox list to allow multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for unlisted services.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (multi-choice) with an optional text input for 'Other'

script.question_text: Which of the following meal kit services have you used? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of meal options offered by your meal kit service?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction rating. Ensure the scale is balanced and easy to understand on mobile devices.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of meal options offered by your meal kit service?

questions.question_text: What do you like most about your meal kit service?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What do you like most about your meal kit service?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your meal kit service to a friend or family member?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to measure Net Promoter Score (NPS) potential. Keep the scale consistent with standard NPS practices.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your meal kit service to a friend or family member?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your meal kit service?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture actionable feedback. Ensure the response field is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your meal kit service?
